docs.snippet: A 355-pound U.S. Army veteran was being held in Texas on $6.5 million bond on Monday, following last week's rampage that killed four women, including his estranged wife and girlfriend, officials said....

docs.snippet: A powerful typhoon battered the northern Philippines on Monday, toppling power lines and dumping heavy rain across mountains, cities and food-growing plains. The storm killed at least one man in a landslide and left 45 fishermen missing....
docs.lead_paragraph: A powerful typhoon battered the northern Philippines on Monday, toppling power lines and dumping heavy rain across mountains, cities and food-growing plains. The storm killed at least one man in a landslide and left 45 fishermen missing.

docs.snippet: Kenneth Bae, 45, a tour operator who was sentenced to 15 years of hard labor, has left the camp where he was being held. His health has declined, his sister said....

docs.abstract: Kenneth Bae, American tour operator imprisoned in North Korea, has been moved from a labor camp to a hospital in the capital of Pyongyang.

docs.snippet: Mediatakeout.com, a celebrity gossip Web site, moves up in the ranks as its staff hunt down scoops....
docs.lead_paragraph: Mediatakeout.com, a celebrity gossip Web site, moves up in the ranks as its staff hunt down scoops.
docs.abstract: Mediatakeout.com, African-American-centric gossip site run by Fred Mwangaguhunga, aims to provide unvarnished tidbits on celebrities of interest to minorities who are passed over by more mainstream gossip outlets; 46 percent of site's visitors are black women.

headline.main: A Gossip Site Finds Its Niche
